text: Fighting temptations Cover Singel Beyoncé, Missy Elliott, MC Lyte and Free from the album The Fighting Temptations soundtrack Released September 2003 Genre Length 3:51 Label Sony BMG Writer Jonathan Burks, Missy Elliott, Karriem Mack, Lana Moorer, Walter Murphy, Lashaun Owens, Gene Pistilli, Marie Wright Producer Missy Elliott Beyoncé singles chronology Baby Boy (2003r.) Fighting temptations Me, Myself and I (2003r.) Missy Elliott singles chronology Back in the Day (2003r.) Fighting temptations Pass That Dutch (2003r.) MC Lyte singles chronology I Can't Make a Mistake (1998r.) Fighting temptations Free singles chronology ? Fighting temptations ? Fighting Temptation is a single released by R&B; singer Beyoncé and female rappers Missy Elliott, MC Lyte, and Free in 2003 to promote the film The Fighting Temptations, in which Beyoncé has a part. The song is part of the official soundtrack. As it was released just one month after the second single from Beyoncé's Dangerously in Love, "Baby Boy", the song did not become a big hit and failed to enter the Billboard Hot 100 and other important U.S. charts. However, the single received some attention from European countries, eventually peaking at number thirteen in the Netherlands. The film was also an instant success, mainly due to Beyoncé's success in Europe at that time. == Track listing == #"Fighting Temptation" (Album Version) #Destiny's Child – "I Know" (Album Version) ==Other versions== *"Fighting Temptation" (Acapella) *"Fighting Temptation" (Instrumental) *"Fighting Temptation" (Radio Edit) Category:Beyoncé songs Category:Missy Elliott songs Category:2003 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Disco songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Fighting Temptation
